posts.post_content: While it is understandable, seeing as walls were very common in the earlier years of Magic, overall it's very narrow and is useful pretty exclusively as a counter-pick. I would have at least liked to see it as a creature, even if the ability couldn't be used first turn. Finally, I do agree that flavor text would have been a nice additive.

Rating:

posts.post_content: I wish this had a mana cost like [War Barge](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=War Barge) instead of a tap, now it needs a [Voltaic Key](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Voltaic Key) or some such. It would flavor well with barge or [Urza's Engine](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Urza's Engine) . If it had "T and some mana to give any number of creatures wall hopping" it would be nifty. Without supporting cards theres only room for one creature in there?
